name: TXT.RPG2
description:
It's a text-based RPG on the planet Evark with many islands on each there are multiple kingdoms with one or more towns in each of those. Each island has a general environmental theme e.g. desert, mountains. Then each kingdom has a specific population e.g. human, undead, orc, demon.

New content will be added weekly, but bug fixes and gameplay additions might come more often

Discord: https://discord.gg/rkJZ9WwPup
